definitions.definition: Willing to wait if necessary; not losing one's temper while waiting .
examples: Be patient : your friends will arrive in a few hours.

definitions.definition: Constant in pursuit or exertion; persevering ; calmly diligent .
Physically able to suffer or bear.

main_definition: ( of a person ) Willing to wait if necessary; not losing one's temper while waiting .
secondary_definitions: Constant in pursuit or exertion; persevering ; calmly diligent .
( obsolete ) Physically able to suffer or bear.
